files.patch:
@@ -92,0 +92,4 @@
+  product(intx, CryptoPmullForCRC32LowLimit, 256,                       \
+          "Minimum size in bytes when Crypto PMULL will be used."       \
+          "Value must be a multiple of 128.")                           \
+          range(256, max_jint)                                          \
